name: Diary of Defender
description: Into the game, you will become a defender, return to the age of war, defense the enemy wave of attack.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: CPU: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050TI / AMD RX Vega 56 or better Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions) Processor: CPU: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD RX Vega 64 Storage: 5 GB available space
